name: eConsent
label: eConsent Module
description: Add this module to add eConsent.

fields.name: uploadLevel
fields.label: The level that the consent will be uploaded on
fields.description: Consent versions may be site-specific or study-wide

fields.name: completeConsent
fields.label: File name of completed consent
fields.description: This will be the field name/file name of the completed consent document (ex. complete_consent)

fields.name: pdfForm
fields.label: Form name where consent versions will be uploaded
fields.description: Type in the full form path that the consent versions will be uploaded on (ex. form.name.econsent.uploads)

fields.name: roles_can_edit
fields.label: Role codes that can edit consent version dropdown
fields.description: These are the role codes that can edit the consent version dropdown

fields.name: enableWithdraw
fields.label: Enable consent withdraw option
fields.description: Choose to enable the ability to withdraw consent within module

fields.name: completeConsentWithdraw
fields.label: File name of completed consent withdraw
fields.description: This will be the field name/file name of the completed consent withdraw document (ex. complete_consent_withdraw)
